sentences.sContent: He stared at the strange apparition before him.
sentences.sCn: 他盯着面前那个古怪的幽灵。

sentences.sContent: a ghostly apparition of a man

synos.tran: 幽灵；幻影；鬼怪；离奇出现的东西

remMethod.val: appar(出现) + ition → 出现的幽灵 → 幽灵； 和appearance(n. 出现； 外貌)来自同一词源

trans.tranOther: something that you imagine you can see, especially the spirit of a dead person
